scripts.replace-cdn: sed '/cdn.tailwindcss.com/d' index.html | sed '/@babel\/standalone/d' | sed -E 's|<script[^>]*type="module"[^>]*>.*?</script>||g' | sed 's|</head>|  <link rel="stylesheet" href="./tailwind.css" />\n</head>|' > dist/index.html
scripts.inject-js: sed '/<script type="text\/babel">/,/<\/script>/d' dist/index.html | sed 's|</body>|  <script src="./app.js"></script>\n</body>|' > dist/index.tmp && mv dist/index.tmp dist/index.html
scripts.minify: npx html-minifier-terser dist/index.html -o dist/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js true --minify-css true
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run replace-cdn && npm run extract-jsx && npm run build:babel && npm run inject-js && npm run minify
